branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod w/Options
branchCategory.description: <p>NCA1 single rod, double acting, medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches. Ten standard available options make the NCA1 extremely versatile for use in many applications.</p>
